ygData.subject: Surprises in store
ygData.msgSnippet: Veratis walked behind Shadow Wing and bandaged the wounds on her shoulders, he was worried that her repair systems still hadn t taken care of the damage.

Veratis walked behind Shadow Wing and bandaged the wounds on her shoulders,
he was worried that her repair systems still hadn't taken care of the
damage. Normally the wounds would have been healed soon as they opened. "You
are correct child, I will need a name to call you. Subject just seems to
improper when it involves a living um being." the word creature came to mind
but sounded almost insulting. "I will call you "Ice" for now until a more
suitable name comes up."

The computer beeped signifying the door opening under a recognizable
signature. Veratis thought nothing of it. Lady Hawk, and Foxfingers should
be returning any time now. He hadn't heard from either one in a while and
was beginning to worry. He put his mind at ease by deciding that they must
be caught up in all the excitement of this amazing new world.

A large figure entered the room and stayed to the Shadows. "I leave for a
few days and this is what happens? Do I have to watch you every moment? Good
to see you're up and about Wing." Lunarpine stepped forward in half wolf
form carrying the sample of DNA from Shadow Wings grave sight. "I guess you
won't need this after all."

"Veratis half smiled. The rejection to the bear DNA was causing the
degeneration, now that they had the right sample he might be able to
stabilize her. "I hate to say it but you'll need to spend a few more hours
in the CR." he turns back to Lunarpine, "And you, I give you a simple task
and a new body and you turn it into a war. I'll see you both in a while."
He adjusted the intake valve on the chamber with the owl DNA knowing he
wouldn't have to explain to "Ice"

Lunarpine stepped into another chamber looking one last time at Shadow Wings
new form. He wanted to throw his arms around her but figured it'd hurt to
much. A bear hug and his wounds would make him regret surviving. "I'll see
you soon" he said to both Veratis and Wing as the door closed.
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 08, 2000 6:34 AM
Subject: Re: New bot


> Shadow Wing::
>
> She looked at Veratis. She felt a twinge of pain as her other wing
> stated to fall off her right shoulder. She growled and reached over
> her shoulder and ripped it off.  The deep red fluid started to flow
> down her shoulder and down her side. Her white fur was turning
> crimson from the blood. She threw down her wings and looked at
> Veratis. "So now I am a new life form." She growled. She wasn't sure
> quite what to do or what to make of all this. She lowered herself
> down on all fours. Her shoulders were dripping with the red fluid.
> "So now that I am this...new form. Give me a new name.  I am no
> longer the bot Shadow Wing."  She looked down. "No...I am no longer
> the embodement of Shadow Wing. I am still who I am, but no longer
> what I was. Veratis, you made this change possable. I ask you...give
> me a name."
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > (Sorry I missed yesterday, work had me busy.)
> >
> > Veratis studied the results of the scans from the CR chamber. "The
> virus
> > seems to have mutated your DNA into a dominant organic form." you
> are
> > something new to translife." He had a flare for the obvious. the
> life form
> > he'd been trying for so long to create was now a reality.
>
>
>
>
>
>
